content: **free crochet-a-long** introduction post - what you need 1 part one the legs 2 part two the head 3 part three the body 4 part four the tail and spots 5 create your very own adorable crochet cow with this easy-to-follow amigurumi pattern this pattern is perfect for beginners and experienced crocheters alike and is available as an instant pdf download so you can get started immediately the pattern includes detailed instructions helpful tips and clear photos to guide you through the process and requires basic crochet skills including single_crochet double_crochet and working in the round you ll need a few basic materials to get started including yarn a crochet hook stuffing and safety eyes the finished cow measures approximately 11 81 30cm tall if made with light worsted/dk/ weight 3 yarn ►crochet level intermediate- you will need to know how to read a pattern and have attempted amigurumi before crocheting in the round ►pattern details - this is a fully written pattern with some links to my youtube channel for tips & tricks - the pattern is only available in english us term crochet - you will be working in rounds - the pattern itself consists of 8 pages all these pages are printer-friendly -
